name: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds
name_original: Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds
description:
Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds is an action game developed by Eurocom and Eurocom Entertainment Software. It was originally released in 2003. It was published by Vivendi Universal Games. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Buffy the Vampire Slayer: Chaos Bleeds on Xbox, GameCube and PlayStation 2.
Ian Livingstone scored the game.
